item.title: Things to Consider before Adopting Gitlab
item.description: You should read this post if you are seriously considering migrating to Gitlab and have Jenkins builds.
item.author: Jose Palma

item.title: How to Install Jenkins on Ubuntu
item.description: Installing Jenkins on Ubuntu is relatively simple. This post will walk you through the installation process. You will need access to the terminal and be able to sudo in order to follow these steps.
item.author: Jose Palma
